snippet: American International Group reported a 5.6 percent increase in quarterly operating profit, driven in part by investments in a big Chinese insurer.
lead_paragraph: American International Group reported a 5.6 percent increase in quarterly operating profit, driven in part by investments in a big Chinese insurer.

headline.main: A.I.G. Reports Jump in Profit, Lifted by Chinese Investment
headline.print_headline: A.I.G. Reports Jump In Profit, Lifted By Chinese Investment
